title: Towards Comprehensive Vietnamese Retrieval-Augmented Generation and Large Language Models
abstract: arXiv:2403.01616v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This paper presents our contributions towards advancing the state of Vietnamese language understanding and generation through the development and dissemination of open datasets and pre-trained models for Vietnamese Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Large Language Models (LLMs).
context:
Title: Towards Comprehensive Vietnamese Retrieval-Augmented Generation and Large Language Models
Abstract: arXiv:2403.01616v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: This paper presents our contributions towards advancing the state of Vietnamese language understanding and generation through the development and dissemination of open datasets and pre-trained models for Vietnamese Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Large Language Models (LLMs).
translated_title: 朝着全面的越南语检索增强生成和大型语言模型迈进
translated_abstract: 这篇论文通过开发和传播用于越南语检索增强生成（RAG）和大型语言模型（LLMs）的开放数据集和预训练模型，展示了我们在推动越南语言理解和生成水平方面的贡献。
tldr: 该论文旨在推动越南语言理解和生成方面的进展，通过开发和分享开放数据集和预训练模型，特别是针对越南语检索增强生成和大型语言模型。
en_tdlr: This paper aims to advance Vietnamese language understanding and generation by developing and sharing open datasets and pre-trained models, specifically focusing on Vietnamese Retrieval-Augmented Generation and Large Language Models.
